貍字的基本解释

貍
lí
同“狸”。

貍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》里之切，平之，來。］
(1)兽名。豹猫。也称野猫、狸猫、狸子、山猫。
(2)指家猫。
[②]［mái］
［《集韻》謨皆切，平皆，明。］
通“埋1”。
(1)埋藏。
(2)古代祭名。谓埋牲、玉、币于地以祭山林川泽。
[②]［yù］
［《集韻》紆勿切，入迄，影。］
通“鬱1”。
通“鬰”。腐臭。

貍字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　貍； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1201第25
【唐韻】里之切【集韻】【韻會】陵之切，?音釐。【集韻】或作?。【爾雅·釋獸】貍狐貒貈醜，其足蹯，其跡?。【說文】伏獸似貙。【正字通】貍，野貓也。有數種：大小似狐，毛雜黃黑，有斑如貓。員頭大尾者爲猫貍，善竊雞鴨。斑如貙虎，方口銳頭者爲虎貍，食虫、䑕、果實。似虎貍，尾黑白錢文相閒者爲九節貍，皮可爲裘領。文如豹而作麝香氣者爲香貍，卽靈貓也。南方有白面尾似狐者爲牛尾貍，亦名白面貍。又登州有貍頭魚尾者，名海貍。【書·禹貢】熊羆狐貍織皮。【左傳·定九年】晳白而衣貍製。【疏】謂黃貍皮也。　又【周禮·夏官·射人】若王大射，則以貍步張三侯。【註】貍，善撙者也。行則止而擬度焉，其發必獲，是以量侯道法之也。　又【儀禮·大射】奏貍首。【註】貍首，逸《詩》曾孫也。貍之言不來也。又【禮·檀弓】貍首之斑然。【註】文采似貍之首。　又【集韻】謨皆切，音霾。本作薶。【論衡】小盜薶步䑕竊。　又或作埋。【五經文字】貍，經典或借用爲埋字。【周禮·天官·鼈人】以時簎魚鼈龜蜃凡貍物。【註】

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
[The cut in "Guangyun", the level, come. ]
(1) The animal name. Ocelot. Also known as wild cats, civet cats, raccoons, and bobcats.
(2) Refers to domestic cats.
[②]［mái］
["Jiyun" Mo is all cut, flat is all, Ming. ]
Pass "Buried 1".
(1) Buried.
(2) Ancient sacrificial names. It is called burying animals, jade, and coins in the ground to worship mountains, forests and rivers.
[②]［yù］
["Ji Yun" Do not cut, enter until, shadow. ]
Linked with "Yu 1".
Same as "鬰". Rancid.
raccoon
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youth Collection] [Zi Character Department] 　 Tanuki; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1201 to 25
【Tang Yun】Li Zhi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tomb cutting,? Yin Li. [Ji Yun] Or make?. 【Erya·Shi Beast】The vulpes and foxes are ugly, their feet, their traces?. 【Said the text】Fu beast is like a dragonfly. [Zhengzitong] raccoon and wild cat. There are several species: the size is like a fox, the hair is mixed with yellow and black, and the spots are like cats. Those with heads and tails are cats and raccoons who are good at stealing chickens and ducks. The spot is like a tiger, and the one with a sharp head is a tiger raccoon, who eats insects, pi, and fruit. Like a tiger raccoon, the black and white tailed raccoon dog is a raccoon with a black and white tail, and the skin can be a fur collar. The person who is like a leopard and has a musky fragrance is a civet, and also a civet. In the south, those with white-faced tails resembling foxes are oxtail raccoons, also known as white-faced raccoons. In Dengzhou, there are people with raccoon head and fish tail, named beaver. 【Book·Yugong】Xiong Feng and fox weaving leather. 【Zuo Zhuan·Ding Nine Years】Clear white and clothed by a raccoon dog. [Sparse] It is also called yellow raccoon skin.　[Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Shooting People] If the king shoots, he will use a raccoon to take a shot. [Note] raccoon dogs, good stunners are also. The act is to stop and try to save Yan, and the hair will be rewarded, which is the measure of the Taoist law.　[Ritual·Large Shot] played raccoon first. [Note] Li Shou, great-grandson of Yi "Poetry". The words of the raccoon won't come. Also [Li·Tan Gong] The head of the raccoon is variegated. [Note] Literary talent is like the head of a raccoon dog.　[Jiyun] Mo is all cut, sound haze. This is a scallop. 【Lun Heng】The thief robbed each other.　Or buried. [Five Classics] raccoon, classic or borrowed as buried characters. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Telini People】In time, the scorpionfish, turtles, turtles and mirages are all raccoon animals. 【Note】
